thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 10 of 1180
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text:
The rooms may not be the best in town, but over the years, renovations have removed the smell of smoke. The location is fantastic. I do the Cooper River Bridge run and have visited several times over the past 30 years. Best of all, the staff are like having friends to greet you when you arrive.
The little shopping Center nearby is convenient. There's an Elvins burger place there. it's not like the original Elvins near White Lake, but a good deal. There's a great coffee place about 1/2 mile on the highway (not 17) where the Cooper River Bridge run starts. It has huge trees over the outdoor deck and excellent lattes.
